bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with huang dan 黃疸 , yellow dan -illness; jaundice. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry huang qi 黃耆 quoting Zhou hou bei ji fang 肘後備急方 4: 酒疸者，心懊痛，足脛滿，小便黃 , “In the case of wine dan -illness one experiences annoyance with pain in the heart and a feeling of fullness in legs and shins. The urine is yellow”. writes: 酒疸黃疾：心 下懊痛，足脛滿，小便黃 , “In the case of wine dan -illness with jaundice oneexperiences annoyance with pain in the heart and a feeling of fullness in legs and shins. The urine is yellow”.
